front.title: Comparison of RADIUS Against AAA Network Access Requirements

abstract.t: The AAA Working Group has completed a document that itemizes their requirements for Network Access Applications (NASREQ, Mobile IP, and ROAMOPS). This document compares the current RADIUS protocol to the Network Access AAA Evaluation Criteria, and illustrates where and how RADIUS can be improved to become unconditionally compliant to these requirements. This document is provided to the AAA Working Group as an official submission for an AAA protocol.
